com.polarion.subterra.base.data.model

Interface ICodeType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IType

    public interface ICodeType
extends IType
    Interface for types to use code mirror
    Since:
    3.8.3

    • Method Detail

      • getEditorProperties

        @NotNull
java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getEditorProperties()

      • getCodeTypeId

        @NotNull
java.lang.String getCodeTypeId()

      • transformForSave

        @Nullable
Text transformForSave(@Nullable
                                Text value,
                                @NotNull
                                IContextId ctxId)
        Possibility to save the value of a field of this type in a different format than what is visible in the editor. E.g. the "value" parameter contains a text in which there is a reference to another workitem. That reference is saved as workitem id in repository, but anywhere above the persistence layer, the reference is seen as the title and the id of that workitem.
        Returns:
        the text that will be saved in the repository.
        Since:
        3.9.1

      • transformForEditor

        @Nullable
Text transformForEditor(@Nullable
                                  Text value,
                                  @Nullable
                                  java.lang.String revision,
                                  @NotNull
                                  IContextId ctxId)
        Possibility to display the value of a field of this type in a different format than what it is saved. E.g. the "value" parameter contains a text in which there is a reference to another workitem. That reference is saved as workitem id in repository, but anywhere above the persistence layer, the reference is seen as the title and the id of that workitem.
        Returns:
        the text that will be passed to the layers above the persistence (like the ui). This is also the value with which the field of this type is indexed.
        Since:
        3.9.1
